casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terraine Sanchez BYERS 69A06-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2019 Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of NC. Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Byers, Terraine Sanchez.

*395The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 27th of February 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of March 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 18th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
